pageContext.claim: “The wonderful Diamond and Silk have been treated so horribly by Facebook. They work so hard and what has been done to them is very sad - and we're looking into. It’s getting worse and worse for Conservatives on social media!”
pageContext.analysis: It's not clear what Trump is referencing. The pro-Trump duo Diamond and Silk had not been banned or admonished by Facebook when Trump tweeted this complaint, though the sisters have been admonished by Facebook in the past for the content of their videos.
